name: Kanyashree Prakalpa

benefits: ["Annual scholarship of Rs. 750","One-time grant of Rs. 25,000"]

description: Basic income support for female heads of household.

description: Encourages women entrepreneurship among the poor.

name: PM-KISAN

name: KALIA Scheme

name: PM SVANidhi

description: Special Micro-Credit Facility for Street Vendors.

name: Stand Up India

name: PMEGP

name: Skill India Mission
description: Training over 40 crore people in India in different skills.

name: Digital India Internship
